author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_12_2_X`.

Includes the migration of all HLT configurations to the `12_2_0_pre2` template, and the integration of the following JIRA ticket:

  - [CMSHLT-2195](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2195): technical changes to `AlCa_LumiPixelCounts` paths (affects 2 triggers in `GRun` and `PRef` menus)
  - [CMSHLT-2198](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2198): addition of `GEMGeometryESModule` to HLT configurations

#### PR validation:

TSG tests.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: HLT menu development for `12_2_X` + migration to `12_2_0_pre2` template
